job_tasks.justification: Maintaining an application involves core software development activities like bug fixing and code improvement.
LTB (likely Low-Code/No-Code or similar process automation) setup and management falls under operations and process engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: richt de onboarding volgens de Cloud standaarden van a.s.r. in
job_tasks.justification: Configuring onboarding according to cloud standards is an operational task related to infrastructure and deployment processes.

job_tasks.phrase: de applicatie onderhoud je door bugs te fixen
job_tasks.justification: Fixing bugs is a fundamental aspect of software development and application maintenance.
Improving code quality is a direct software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: alerting en monitoring in Application Insights
job_tasks.justification: Setting up alerting and monitoring, especially using a tool like Application Insights, is a key MLOps/DevOps function.

job_tasks.phrase: zorgt ervoor dat nieuwe gebruikers binnen a.s.r. worden aangesloten
job_tasks.justification: Onboarding new users and managing their access is part of application management and often involves software integration tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: bouwt interfaces voor nieuwe bronnen en consumerende systemen
job_tasks.justification: Building interfaces for new sources and consuming systems is a core software development task, involving integration.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelt interfaces voor het aansluiten op het DataWareHouse
job_tasks.justification: Developing interfaces to connect to a Data Warehouse is a software development activity focused on data integration.
Developing new features is a primary software development responsibility.

soft_skills.phrase: richt de onboarding volgens de Cloud standaarden van a.s.r. in
bouwt interfaces voor nieuwe bronnen en consumerende systemen
ontwikkelt interfaces voor het aansluiten op het DataWareHouse en nieuwe features

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on traditional software development, application maintenance, and operations engineering (MLOps/DevOps) tasks such as bug fixing, code improvement, setting up monitoring, and building interfaces. There is no mention of generative AI models, LLMs, RAG, fine-tuning, or any specific AI-related modeling tasks.
